description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+25 vs AC; 3d8+8 damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+25 vs AC; 2d8+8 damage.

At-Will

Standard

Close blast 5

+23 vs AC; 4d6+8 damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

At-Will

Standard

The elder silver dragon makes a claw attack against each enemy within reach. It also attacks one creature with a bite

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Reach 2

Trigger: When an enemy attacks the elder silver dragon while flanking it, at-will

Targets the triggering enemy and an enemy flanking with the triggering enemy; +25 vs AC; 2d8+8 damage.

Recharge 4-6 ✦ Cold

Standard

Close blast 5

+21 vs Reflex; 3d8+8 cold damage, and the target gains vulnerable 10 to all damage (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the elder silver dragon uses it

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +21 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the elder silver dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).
An elder silver dragon can make opportunity attacks against all enemies within its reach (2 squares).
An elder silver dragon makes saving throws against ongoing damage at the start of its turn as well as at the end of its turn.
